title: When is Android 10 coming to my phone?
text:
Android 10: The five best new features explained Android 10 brought several new features, along with many additional ones set to roll out in the coming weeks. ZDNet's Beth Mauder breaks down five of her favorite features. Read more: https://zd.net/2ZEeOLG

Android 10 was launched on September 3, 2019. But this being Android, unless you're running a newish Google Pixel smartphone there is likely going to be a delay between launch and it getting to your device.

How long of a delay? It depends. Could be soon. Could be next year. Could be never.

Must read: iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, and iPhone 11 Pro Max: What are the differences?

Google Pixel

The good news is that if you own one of the following Google smartphones, the update has already began rolling out to you:

Pixel

Pixel XL

Pixel 2

Pixel 2 XL

Pixel 3

Pixel 3 XL

Pixel 3a

Pixel 3a XL

But what if you don't own a Pixel? Then things get a bit vague.

Here's what we know at present (Sept. 16, 2019):

Essential Phone

Already available to select open market customers.

OnePlus

The devices will update to Android 10 in September 2019:

OnePlus 7 Pro

OnePlus 6

OnePlus 6T

Possibly OnePlus 5 and OnePlus 5T

Samsung

These devices will likely see updates in early 2020:

Galaxy S10

Galaxy S10+

Galaxy S10e

Galaxy Note 10

Galaxy Note 10+

Galaxy Note 9

Galaxy S9

Galaxy S9+

Nokia

The devices will update to Android 10 in fourth-quarter 2019:

Nokia 9 PureView

Nokia 8.1

Nokia 7.1

The devices will update to Android 10 in first-quarter 2020:

Nokia 8 Sirocco

Nokia 7 Plus

Nokia 6.1 Plus

Nokia 6

Nokia 5.1 Plus

Nokia 4.2

Nokia 3.2

Nokia 3.1 Plus

Nokia 2.2

Nokia 1 Plus

The devices will update to Android 10 in second-quarter 2020:

Nokia 5.1

Nokia 3.1

Nokia 2.1

Nokia 1

Huawei

The devices will update to Android 10 in November 2019:

Huawei P30

Huawei P30 Pro

The devices will update to Android 10 in December 2019:

Huawei Mate 20

Huawei Honor 20

Huawei View 20

The devices will update to Android 10 in early 2020:

Huawei P30 Lite

Huawei P20 series

Huawei Mate 10

The remainder of the supported handsets will update to Android 10 sometime during the second-quarter 2020.

Xiaomi

The devices will update to Android 10 by October/November 2019:

K20 Pro

Mi 9

Mi 9T

Motorola

The devices will likely update to Android 10 by the end of 2019 or early 2020:

Moto Z4

Moto Z3

Z3 Play

Moto G7

G7 Power

G7 Play

G7 Plus

Moto E6

Motorola One

One Power

One Action

Moto X4 Android One

Sony

The devices will likely update to Android 10 by end of 2019:

Xperia XZ2

Xperia XZ3

Expect more flagship and mid-range handsets to see updates before the year is out.

LG

No updates likely until 2020. Supported handsets are likely to include:

LG G8 ThinQ

LG G7 ThinQ

G7 models

LG V40

LG V50.

HTC

The devices will likely update to Android 10 by end of 2019:

U12

U12 +

U11

Asus

The ROG Phone and ROG 2 probably won't start seeing updates until 2020.

Oppo

Probably won't start seeing updates until 2020.

Vivo

Beyond the Vivo X27, which is in the beta program and might see an update before the year is out, it's a mystery.

Are you looking forward to Android 10? Will your handset get the update? If not, what are your plans? Let me know your thoughts.

Related stories:
description: Could be soon. Could be next year. Could be never.
